## Makefile

- 格式:

    ```makefile
    target: prerequisites
        recipe
    ```

- 缺省规则

    ```makefile
    .DEFAULT_GOAL := all
    all: ...
    ```

- 伪规则

    ```makefile
    .PHONY: all clean
    ```
